thread.title: Emma Roberts has us putting our rose-colored glasses on so we can properly see this dress
thread.title_full: Emma Roberts has us putting our rose-colored glasses on so we can properly see this dress

author: Olivia Harvey
title: Emma Roberts has us putting our rose-colored glasses on so we can properly see this dress
text:
Emma Roberts has us putting our rose-colored glasses on so we can properly see this dress Everything was coming up roses at New York Fashion Week’s Coach runway show yesterday. And we mean that in the literal sense. Coach based most of their Spring 2017 collection around the floral pattern. Plus, actress Emma Roberts has us putting on our rose-colored glasses to get the full experience of her Coach Spring 2017 dress and our world has been changed for the better.
Roberts wore a rose-pattered mini dress with sheer black sleeves and lace details. Although it’s from the spring collection, the black accents add a gothic element to the dress. This piece could easily work for fall and winter as well.
Matched with her new light auburn locks, Roberts was a vision in red. Getty Images / Presley Ann Slack Outside the show, Roberts was spotted wearing the dress with a simple black peacoat and black ankle-strap heels. With a dress as cool as this, you don’t need to go overboard with the accessories!
The floral pattern does all the talking. Getty Images / Daniel Zuchnik Roberts joined Drew Barrymore and Sabrina Carpenter in the front row for the Coach runway show. We’re digging Carpenter’s red leather jacket with lace details and brass studs. She paired the jacket with another of Coach’s sheer rose maxi dresses.
Getty Images / Presley Ann Slack And later Roberts caught up with her bestie, Brit Elkin (who was also wearing a Coach Spring 2017 piece), for Valentine’s Day. She posted a photo of the two of them on her Instagram, captioning the pic, “happy to be spending it with the Gayle to my Oprah. The Busy to my Michelle and the Peet to my Paulson.”
Happy Valentine's Day ❤happy to be spending it with the Gayle to my Oprah. The Busy to my Michelle and the Peet to my Paulson @britelkin 
A post shared by Emma Roberts (@emmaroberts) on Feb 14, 2017 at 12:33pm PST 
Emma Roberts in her Coach rose dress is a vampy dream right out of an American Horror Story episode. Maybe we can get Coach and AHS to collaborate for next season. Let’s get it trending!
